greeting-p0:
🐵 I'm Madeliene!
Great to meet you!

I'm an expert on reproductive health. I can help you by answering questions, giving an assessment, or connecting you with local resources. What would you like to do?
greeting-p2: Ok! I'm going to ask you a few questions to see what product is best for you. Do you like to exercise during your period?
greeting-p4: What specifically are you looking for?
greeting-p5: Great! You will be most comfortable going with tampons
greeting-p6: No problem! You will be most comfortable going with pads
